{{authors.length}} authors

  • {{author}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthorService } from '../author.service'; @Component({ selector: 'authors', templateUrl: './authors.component.html', styleUrls: ['./authors.component.css'] }) export class AuthorsComponent { authors:any; constructor(private authorService: AuthorService){ this.authors = authorService.getAuthors(); } }
